definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: We rarely think to question the financialconcepts we believe in and follow.—Garrett B. Gunderson, Killing Sacred Cows
sentences.chinese: 我们几乎不去质疑自己相信和遵循的理财观念。

sentences.english: And I'm convinced self-depreciation goes right to the heart of our financial ruts.
sentences.chinese: 我确信自我贬值促成了我们理财习惯的核心。

sentences.english: Hostesses are also writing best-selling books, be they on money management or the art of conversation.
sentences.chinese: 陪酒女们也写出了畅销书，讲述如何理财和谈话艺术。

sentences.english: Smart personal finance is boring, too.
sentences.chinese: 聪明的个人理财书都很没劲。

sentences.english: All deliveries MUST include client name and Schwab account number.
sentences.chinese: 所有交收必须包括客户姓名及嘉信理财帐户号码。

sentences.english: But, professional property of financiers had no effect on cognitive confidence.
sentences.chinese: 但是理财师专业性对认知信任不能产生显著影响。

sentences.english: The third major trend is an increase in women’s financial literacy.
sentences.chinese: 第三大趋势是妇女理财水平提高。

sentences.english: So many financial failures are the result of lack of proper prioritization.
sentences.chinese: 所以很多理财失败，都是因为缺少适当地优化。

sentences.english: Financial planers help individuals and businesses organize their financial affairs .
sentences.chinese: 理财师帮助个人和企业组织他们的财务事项。

sentences.english: The firm was barred from managing money for clients permanently and fined $218,000.
sentences.chinese: 公司被永远禁止代客理财并罚款218000美元。

sentences.english: At present, China's exoteric funds show the advance of specialist financing on the whole.
sentences.chinese: 目前我国开放式基金总体显示了专家理财的优势。

sentences.english: The total daily transfer limit for Hang Seng (China) Manned Phone Banking Service and Automated Phone Banking Services are shared.
sentences.chinese: 自动语音电话理财服务的日转账总额度为共享。

sentences.english: Home improvement budget for the fiscal first step after the renovation.
sentences.chinese: 家装理财第五步不盲目攀比装修档次。

sentences.english: Luck is with you, regardless of the financial venture.
sentences.chinese: 你的星运指数高，这和理财风险是没有关系的。

sentences.english: Clason offers personal finance wisdom in the form of parables.
sentences.chinese: Clason将个人理财智慧融入寓言之中。

sentences.english: A good manager is frugal in the use of his funds .
sentences.chinese: 一个善于理财的人在资金运用上是很节俭的。

definition: certificate of deposit/time deposit/abbr. for 定期存款|定期存款[ding4 qi1 cun2 kuan3]
to invest in stock/to buy shares
to deposit money (in a bank etc)/bank savings/bank deposit
lit. moonlight group/fig. those who spend their monthly income even before they earn their next salary (slang)
to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
to be in debt/to incur debts/liability (finance)
